Text:
I totally love this series, i remember it from when i had cable. If this is going to be a regular release, please let us know so i can keep watch for it. 

Thank you so very much!

Sorry to disappoint you, but this is the only episode I've got :(

My intention of posting this was to encourage anyone out there who have more of them to upload theirs :D

Found this one on DC++, but haven't been able to find more.

well either way, thanks for posting this 1 ep, it rocks!
excellent job on this one, thanks again. 

cheers!
